name: Cool game v 0.0.2 (PowerPoint)
description:
Hello guys! This is game made in PowerPoint. You cant change things because it is read-only. This game is demo early acccess,it will be updated later. This isn't a software a PowerPoint slideshow.  It feels like your player is for 0 use,game is controlled by slideshow pages and feels like a 0-player game? This game is 1 level only because i am too lazy to make new level ideas.

Tutorial: Click and press ENTER,arrow keys to play. 

This game's version is v 0.0.2 now.

See you later in new updates!
